actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

official_title: To permit Pell Grant recipients to receive grants to cover more than one full-time academic year of study during a 12-month award year period and to extend the period of eligibility for Pell Grants by one academic year.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to revise the Pell Grant program to: (1) permit recipients to receive increased award amounts to cover more than one full-time academic year of study during a 12-month award year period; and (2) extend the period of eligibility by one academic year.

titles.title: To permit Pell Grant recipients to receive grants to cover more than one full-time academic year of study during a 12-month award year period and to extend the period of eligibility for Pell Grants by one academic year.
